评论概述: Shrinking fabric, impractical slit bottoms, overpriced
评论详情: Despite high price tag, shrinks significantly a size or two after one wash.  The open slit bottom is impractical and falls on the ground in public toilets. I wouldn't wear this if using a public toilet is a possibility. This shouldn't be priced like this.
I really like this set. Very comfy

This is the perfect length pant for me at 5’3” when I wear them a little high-waisted. The top is perfection- great neckline and just a bit cropped but not too much. The fabric is such a nice weight and feels so high quality. Love the ribbing as well. I initially got the black and now have ordered the sand as well!
Very warm. Better suited to the weather in the Midwest. The top is a bit cropped and not great for a busty woman.
Top is not true to size, I am petite and the top is too short and sleeves are too short.
cut too big
This is a M if you're closer to a Small. Size chart is off. Seeing that it contains viscose (heavy shrinkage), size up!.... And, it smells to high heaven

Super cute, very cozy and fantastic quality! I have gotten so many compliments on this set. The top is a little cropped which I like, both top and bottom have good stretch to them. The ribbed look makes the outfit appear more expensive than it was. Definitely purchase this set you will not be disappointed

Love the color.  It’s like the photo.  Comfortable fit and warm. This is my second one I ordered.  My first one washed great didn’t shrink or stretch out. I haven’t washed this one yet.  Happy with my purchase.

This set is such a great quality it is thick, soft, comfy and totally worth the price. The pants were a little short, so if your taller size up. The brown color was also a little more of a redder brown. Very happy with my purchase!
Perfect for winter and super cute!! Wears well.

I'm 5'3 and about 180 and I ordered the L. It fits so perfectly. This set will be in my regular rotation on WFH days.

I bought this as a Christmas gift on October 24th. The gift was just received on Christmas Day and does not fit. The return date has passed. Is there anything you can do to help me with this situation? Thank you.
Very comfortable. And when I wear my tennis shoes with it to run to the store I get many compliments on it.
Granddaughter was so pleased!
Looks very nice on, I love wearing it when I have a nice place to go. Its true to size.

评论概述: The sleeves were huge and too long
评论详情: Loved the fabric but it didn’t fit well

Gorgeous color!  Extremely Well made knit. Shimmers in the light. Warm, drapes nicely on the body.  Wide waistband that fits nicely on the waist and a beautiful ribbon draw string and the ribbon stays put! You never ever have to re adjust. The top is gorgeous too, sits at your waist not below your bottom.  Perfect size, true to size. I wore this outfit to a Dr.’s appointment, and I received many compliments immediately.  It is a feel good outfit. Feel polished with a nice handbag, shoes.  Not heavy on!  This fabric breaths! You will feel warm and cozy but not Hot in temperature. Beautiful to dress up or dress down.  Just be careful ( it may snag)  I highly recommend this name brand and every color is beautiful.  I purchased 3 sets.  Deep Navy, this blue, winter green for Christmas Day.  I hope you enjoy this high quality outfit. Looks nothing like a sweatsuit, or a jogger suit. It’s just beautiful.  I am thrilled with my 3 purchases. Perfect for the cool evenings and perfect outfit for the Holidays 🎄♥️Enjoy. Merry Christmas and Happy New year.
Beautifully made classy outfit!
Gets larger as you’re wearing it & moving around through out the day. Shrinks after washing. Waste of $

Excellent quality. Love it!
I bought this set for my mom. Great quality well made! She’s 5’2 168 pounds and got her a M and it fits perfect. I’d buy again but in different color!
Runs a bit small, comfy to wear around the house

Top is slightly oversized but over all great fit and quality! Loved using it at the airport as it’s thick enough for the cold plane ride but light weight enough to no make me sweat. I’m 5’2 size small for reference

True to size . Soft material and has a bit of weight to it.  I will be wearing this in cool weather and my visit north. I haven’t washed it yet. I do love it! You can dress it up or go casual .  I’m 5’3 and weight 125 lb.

评论概述: Too large, had dog hair all over it
评论详情: First the set is too large and the pants too long. The quality didn’t seem great and looks cheap.  Then I noticed white dog or cat hair all over the pants. Returned product maybe or who knows why it came like that
The pants are amazing - super warm!  The shirt is made super small

评论概述: Sand Color - NOT for fair blondes :) Black is great though!
评论详情: LOVE the quality and fit - very thick and not cheap feeling at all.  Normally I have my go-to black I buy in almost everything.  After seeing my friend in the cream/white tone, I decided I wanted to branch out and try the sand color. (I saw the cream/white showed underwear a bit more noticeably.)  To note - I am light blonde and fair skinned.  The sand arrives -and I am so excited to try on my new cozy set- only to be met by my reflection in the mirror as a head to toe flesh popsicle.  I was uni-toned - it was hideous. :)  I returned it for the black - and LOVE it.
I received many compliments on this set and loved it. Until I washed it,  and it shrunk so much that it no longer fits me.  Buy a larger size to accommodate.
This outfit is so comfortable and feels very stylish. Highly recommend!

Really love this cozy, chic outfit. I question if I look as though I’m wearing pjs in public, but it’s always the first thing I grab when needing warm loungewear. TBD on how it will weather multiple washes.
Top is shorter than described and the pants are longer. Not a fan. Color is nice
After one was this shrank significantly, which looks ridiculous with these wide leg bottoms
Love these pants! Not crazy about the top, but pants make the purchase worth it.

Ok, wow!  I love this set.  It’s thick and really nice quality.  I hope they come out with more colors for fall, like olive green or burgundy!  I’m 5’1 and 117 lbs and the small fits perfect!  If you are petite, the pants will be the perfect length :)
I love it !!!!!!
Material is soft but very thick.  Small also.

Got this as a comfy set to wear as I flew to Chicago and then Austin. It's super comfortable and the ribbed look of the material is a bit more flattering and forgiving than if it was plain and its not heavy or too thick. The Hunter green color is beautiful. I got lots of compliments. The length was good though the top is a bit shorter than I'd prefer overall give it a solid 9 out of 10. Just wish it had pockets!
The fit is perfect and it is super soft and comfortable. Great travel or loungewear outfit!

I love this set! It’s very cute and makes you feel cute at home. It’s thick and keeps you warm. IM 5’5, 135lb and got a medium and it fit perfect. The only thing I will say is to NOT DRY IT. It WILL SHRINK. Now it doesn’t fit well and if I left my arms most of my stomach shows.
Comfortable and truly soft. A great outfit to wear to work or even for an evening out to dinner.
Great quality, super weight, really comfy for long plane rides!! Would definitely buy again.
So comfortable and stylish perfect for cold days! Fabric is very stretchy and soft. I highly recommend this set!
I travel a lot for work and these are a godsend! They’re so comfortable and they look formal. My coworker said she needed to change when she saw me!

This Loungewear Set is GORGEOUS!!  Just order it and you won’t regret it!!After reading several reviews, I came to the conclusion that a Medium would fit me best.  Amazon suggested a Large for me but several people who are my height and weight all claimed that a Medium fit perfectly and was loose but not too oversized.  The outfit runs Large so if you prefer a more form fitting size, I recommend going down a size and you will still feel comfortable.  This outfit is not only stretchy but it’s also made for comfort so it’s not going to be tight.I am 5’ 6” tall and I weigh 145 pounds so I ordered a Medium and it’s very cozy and not too big but loose enough.  I could easily order a Small and still have plenty of room without it being snug.  I like my clothes to fit loosely and look comfortable so I’m keeping the Medium and I will order a Small next time.Several people claimed the fabric shrinks after washing and putting it in the dryer so I will definitely be washing mine in cold water and laying flat to dry.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with this set.  I will say it is pricey but the quality is definitely worth the price.  I will be watching for it to go on sale for the holidays and I will definitely order more in other colors.I hope this review helps those of you who are on the fence about whether or not to order this set.  I find a good review should include your weight, height and what size fit you best.  The more information you give helps narrow down the perfect size for others before they place their order.  The size charts aren’t always accurate and shopping online is difficult.The color is Beautiful and looks exactly like the picture.  The fabric and detail is very high quality.  I would consider this outfit lightweight as far as how it feels on my body but you could easily get away with being very comfortable on a chilly Fall day or night without a jacket or coat if you’re like me and get too warm in long sleeves.  The fabric is very soft and just the perfect weight to be considered Loungewear and not heavy like a sweatshirt and sweatpants.  You could wear a Cardigan over it if it’s really chilly without overlayering.
The bottoms are too big.

I was super skeptical that it would be worth the money, but I’m so glad I took the risk! I am 5’7” 145-150lbs and I’m a muscular funky shape with a 26” waist and 40” hips with projection. I got a size medium and it’s perfect! Not to big on my waist and doesn’t hug my butt where I get the under tuck thing. And they’re long enough! They do not hit the ground, they hit me at my ankles and I have long legs. Thick material that feels high end and sturdy. I might buy more colors. Favorite set yet
Super cute and comfortable! Easy to dress up or down

Runs small. Wish it would have fit because it was so soft and comfy. Maybe a darker color would have looked nicer and made me look Slimmer but the light tan color was not flattering on me. Would be perfect for slimmer woman.

I love this whole outfit so much I am going to buy another. So I bought a light color and I think it is called peach then the light blue also. Amazingly comfortable and stylish I get so many complements on them. :)

I wanted to love this. I've been looking for a 2 piece leisure set like this for a while. The fabric is nice weight but the overall look is frumpy. I wear a size 0/2, bought a small It was just an unflattering fit.
The fit isn’t as chic as I’d like. It looks more frumpy than elevated. I like it for the price.

This set is so cute and comfy. Also very good quality. Great value!
The pants were much wider than I thought. Top was way shorter than expected. Material is heavy but cute if it fits you properly.

This set is so cute! The fabric feels luxury. It's a perfect weight. Not to heavy, not at all sheer. will be perfect for looking freaking adorable in lounge wear. Would wear this to work on a casual day. Perfect to fly in. It would get six stars from me if it had cute square pockets on the front of the pants. That's the only thing missing.

This looks like a weird sweater suit you would be issued in prison. It’s thick and bulky and the high round neck makes it look like you’re wearing a straight jacket. Very unflattering!! Tried cutting the neck to make it a little more open - nope, still ugly.

This is the best sweater set I’ve ever been able to find. It’s so soft, stretchy and comfy and fits perfect (true to size - I’m curvy size 6/8, 5’3”, 135 and I got M). Perfectly thick ribbed sweater material. Can dress up for lunch or errands or wfh and be comfy inside. Buying in more colors immediately!

Very Comfortable and made very well! It washes well too. Note: it will shrink a little bit if you put it in the dryer, so be careful to Follow Instructions! Outfit also makes my but look really good! I liked it so much, bought three more in different colors.?
Fit perfectly, color was great!  I’m 5.5 and 140lbs.  Medium fit perfect.
It's OK but only OK

I got this set when it was on sale in the oatmeal color.  I was pleasantly surprised….no, make that shocked…..at the quality, color and fit.  I wore it on a 12 hour international  flight and was so glad I did.  It was comfortable and looked very chic.  It’s not too heavy and not too light.  I like it so much I ordered it in cream for my picky, fashionista daughter who mostly only wears expensive designer labels.  She loves it too.  I am 5’4 amd 128 pounds and the small fits perfectly.  Don’t hesitate to buy this!  You won’t be disappointed

I had no expectations when I purchased this set but I’m very impressed. It’s a nice thick material and very soft. You can dress it up or wear casual for day to day. I got it in two colors. Nice for in between weather.

I love this set, it’s so comfy and cute, HOWEVER it came with a huge hole in the crotch that I didn’t realize until after I washed and took tags off. This was supposed to be for my bachelorette party and I wasn’t able to wear it unfortunately.

This product is super fabulous for long distance flights. It’s dressy, classy & comfortable. I’m always cold on flights but this outfit kept me warm & cost. The only issue I have is that there was some shrinkage after washing. Glad I got a Medium vs Small.

I really like this product! Very nice quality and it looks comfy and beautiful at the same time.
On trend and fit like a dream. It has quickly become my favorite grab for a airport & travel outfit that's chic, comfortable & versatile.

Really quite impressed.  Love the color, the fit, the look and the comfort.

Excellent quality. Perfect fit (M) 5’3 138lb
Material is good, not to obsessed about the top. Bottom fits well
Very soft, high quality, very thick.
Well made. Looks rich

评论概述: Sent the wrong size I ordered small sent large
评论详情: I ordered a small & they sent a large Fabric is awful. Came in a flat plastic Bag all wrinkled. I do not like it sending back

I loved the way this looked and felt. Tried on out of the bag and pants were the perfect length. I then washed on cold delicate and hung to dry and they shrunk up :/ they will be ankle length on me now which is not the look I was going for … I am 128 lbs 5’5” and purchased a small
Haven’t tried it on yet but man is it good quality. The weight of it shows it’s made well. Really heavy.
Did not like the dleeves

This set is so nice. The quality is very nice as well. I have already washed it on cool with like colors and tumble dried it. Turned out beautifully. It is very comfortable and can easily be dressed up or down.
Material is more heavy than expected and comfortable fabric quality Laundered items in cold and didn’t notice shrinkage. Will happily wear for airline travel and casual events.

Fit wise: I’m 5’3” with a 29” inseam, and the bottoms hit at or just at the bottom of my ankles (which is just where I wanted them to hit). My waist is 29” and my hips are 39”. The bottoms couldn’t be more perfect. The top is a bit too big on me, but the length of the top is very good. And when I say too big, I think it is just the look. It’s just boxy, and I like things to be a bit more fitted. The arm length is good - they aren’t supposed to come to my wrist. The weight of the fabric is nice. I’m not going to wear these until it’s a bit later in the year - too hot right now - August in California! I don’t know how they will wash, but am planning on washing on cold - delicate and drying on no heat, then lying flat - the fabric is too heavy to hang dry.

Color blue is lovely but runs long in sleeves and legs. Like so well I hemmed leg length and will see. I ordered from picture and model picture showed it to be shorter in leg. Value for money is great and fabric is great.

This is the cutest outfit. I bought the dark blue which kinda looks like a dark blue storm cloud. I’m 5’3” maybe 100 lbs. Always hesitant about ordering if I can’t get an XS. Went ahead and ordered size small and it fits pretty good. This outfit is so so soft and thick. I’m short waisted making the bottoms high waisted and the top isn’t too short.
Loved the look and it’s comfy, but don’t dry! It shrank too much and now is too small
Was not told via advertisement the type of fabric 😩
Felt like cheap acrylic and too wrinkled to deal with.

This is a perfect set for so many uses; traveling, running errands or even at home. It’s soft and has a nice weight, not too thin at all. Holds a good shape and flattering on the body. I plan to buy another color as well. I bought the dark blue and it’s really a nice tone.
Bought for a gift and she loved it. Looked and fit great!
Cute outfit, it's good quality.
